channel.title: Good gear to use against armored zombies?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm wondering, what's the best equipment to get the fastest XP and stay there for long times. If you could supply both armor and inventory gear that would be great! I'm training Defence BTW :)

item.title: Good gear to use against armored zombies?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

yes but salve ammy (e) gives +20% atk & str bonus against undead monsters so it’s better there for maximum xp

Yeah ik that part but idk just sayin
but im just sayin full proselyte gives +17, you can almost substitute that for one of the necklaces, and wear strength boostin armor

Read full topic
item.source: Good gear to use against armored zombies?

item.source: Good gear to use against armored zombies?

item.title: Good gear to use against armored zombies?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“theman321, post:9, topic:412188”]^^ How much is full dharok and how much you got atm?[/quote]Lemme refrase that… I don’t feel like putting out the money to buy Dhorak’s. I would have enough but I don’t think I want to put it out cause I need it for skilling.

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:10, topic:412188”]Proselyte full, salve ammy (e), neitiznot, rapier, dboots, berserker ring (i) preferably and fire cape. Along with turmoil + extremes gets you a good 100k+/hr, at least for me

and dont use full dharok there these guys are fucking idiots they dont know shit[/quote]I don’t have a rapier, zerker ring, salve ammy, fire cape, turmoil or extremes xD And I was thinking Dhorak’s was more for PKing.

Read full topic
item.source: Good gear to use against armored zombies?

item.title: Good gear to use against armored zombies?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Proselyte full, salve ammy (e), neitiznot, rapier, dboots, berserker ring (i) preferably and fire cape. Along with turmoil + extremes gets you a good 100k+/hr, at least for me

and dont use full dharok there these guys are fucking idiots they dont know shit

Read full topic

item.title: Good gear to use against armored zombies?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:6, topic:412188”]Use prayer armour.[/quote][quote=“drubrkletern, post:7, topic:412188”]If usin pray armor I’d recommend Reverence, splitdrag/demonhorn nec, initiate/or proselyte if you can wear it) those are some good items for it :D[/quote]Thanks for the suggestions, but I’m a high enough level to not get wounded that bad and I use Guthan’s too.

[quote=“rip4d, post:5, topic:412188”]Whole set of course.[/quote]I would if I had enough money

Read full topic
